source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH FactuurInfo AS (
    SELECT
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY f.[Id]
            ORDER BY f.[Krow__Invoice_Date__c], f.[Id]
        ) AS RowNum,
        f.[Id],
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Date__c] AS Datum,
        f.[Recognition_Date__c] AS Factuurdatum, 
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Serial_Number__c] AS Factuur,
        f.[Name] AS FactuurNaam,
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Subtotal__c] AS Subtotaal,
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Total__c] AS Totaal,
        f.[Krow__Additional_Amount__c] AS AdditionalAmount,
        f.[Krow__Total_Tax_Amount__c] AS TotalTaxAmount,
        f.[Krow__Invoice_Amount__c] AS InvoiceAmount,
        f.[Krow__Fixed_Fee_Amount__c] AS FixedFeeAmount,
        f.[Krow__Status__c] AS Status,
        f.[Krow__Labour_Hours__c] AS WerkUren,
        f.[Revenue_Category__c] AS OmzetCategorie,
        f.Practice__c AS Practice,
        P.ProjectKey,
        P.TeamKey as ProjectTeamKey,
        k.KlantKey,
        t.TeamKey,
        pr.PracticeKey
    FROM s2_stg_salesforce.Invoice f
    LEFT JOIN [s2_stg_salesforce].[InvoiceLineItem] fr 
        ON fr.[Krow__Invoice__c] = f.[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [s2_stg_salesforce].[TimesheetSplit] ts 
        ON fr.[Krow__Timesheet_Split__c] = ts.[Id]
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimProjecten P
        ON f.Krow__Project__c = P.ProjectId
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimTaakregels tr
        ON fr.Krow__Task__c = tr.TaakregelId
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimMedewerkers m
        ON fr.Krow__Project_Resource__c = m.MedewerkerIdSF
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimKlanten k
        ON f.Krow__Account__c = k.KlantNaam
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimTeam t
        ON f.Team__c = t.[Team]
    LEFT JOIN s3_ods.DimPractice pr on 
        f.Practice__c = pr.PracticeNaam)
SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Id) AS FactuurKey,
    Datum,
    Factuurdatum,
    Factuur,
    FactuurNaam,
    Subtotaal,
    Totaal,
    AdditionalAmount,
    TotalTaxAmount,
    InvoiceAmount,
    FixedFeeAmount,
    Status,
    WerkUren,
    OmzetCategorie,
    ProjectKey,
    ProjectTeamKey,
    KlantKey,
    TeamKey,
    PracticeKey
FROM FactuurInfo
WHERE 0=0
and RowNum = 1
-- and Factuur = 'G-21558'
